project(worhp)

add_library(
	${PROJECT_NAME}
	SHARED
	IMPORTED
	GLOBAL
)

set_target_properties(
	${PROJECT_NAME}
	PROPERTIES
		IMPORTED_IMPLIB
			"${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../lib/libworhp.lib"
		IMPORTED_LOCATION
			"${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../lib/libworhp${CMAKE_SHARED_LIBRARY_SUFFIX}"
		IMPORTED_NO_SONAME
			true
		INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES
			$<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}>
)
